      • getDirectoryFiles

                                               java.lang.String[] exts,
                                               boolean recursive)
        NT-Get directory files
        Parameters:
        dir - Directory object.
        exts - Array of file endings (extension).
        recursive - If True, read all subdirectories recursive. Else read specified directory only.
        Returns:
        Function returns array of founded files.

      • getDirectoryFilesRecurse

                                             java.lang.String[] exts,
                                             boolean recursive)
        NT - Get directory files recursively.
        Parameters:
        result - Result list of founded File objects
        dir - Directory object.
        exts - Array of file endings (extension).
        recursive - If True, read all subdirectories recursive. Else read specified directory only.

      • checkFileExt

        private static boolean checkFileExt(java.io.File f,
                                    java.lang.String[] exts)
        NT-Check file extension matched array contents.
        Parameters:
        f - File or Directory object.
        exts - Array of name ending string's.
        Returns:
        Function returns True if file title matched with any of specified title ending's. Function returns False otherwise.
